question:
You have just read an article in an international travel magazine which contained some information about your town that is incorrect. 
Write a letter to the editor of the magazine, In you letter 
•	Correct the information in the article 
•	Explain why it is important for the magazine to give correct information 
•	suggest what the magazine should do about this situation
text: I am writing this letter to draw your attention to the terrible mistake that one of your writers made while he describes the location of my hometown in your magazine.

Firstly, he wrote that Cairo has located on the north of Egypt overview the sea, while its location is on the north middle of Egypt and it has not any seaside. Nonetheless, it has a Nile river which through it.

Indeed, I was shocked by this wrong information which may cause confusion for tourists who decided to visit Cairo soon. In addition, it is quite important for your magazine repetition your team have to be more accurate while providing a piece of specific important information.
I suggest your writers  collect more accurate information before presenting it. Besides, it will be better to inform you before publishing to be sure if there is a need for the corrections.
I looking forward to receiving your response to this letter, and thank you for your time.
